title: Has anyone been denied mastery points?
body:
I just played a match and when it finished (at 20:00) I noticed my mastery gain wasn't shown, instead all I saw was a spinning circle where the score was meant to be and I didn't notice any difference in my mastery portraits

(I won btw)

replies.body: Might be that there was a bit of lag causing a slow update of your client. It sometimes happens with LP gains or IPs, i guess it can happen with mastery points too.

I had the same thing! I didn't think much of it at the time but now I see it here! I had a game with {{champion:39}} and I did super well so I was excited to see how many points I got, however when I finished there was just that spinning circle.. my last game with her before then was on the 15th of May, not sure if champion mastery was out then but I do have her with as many points and a champion who I have one a game with ... so it seems OK, it was just weird ...

How was your individual performance?

I had the same thing happen this morning after a decent fail/feed game.
But I put it down to client derp rather than being "denied"
My team fed like you couldn't believe but I was 7/4 (they also suddenly got an afk, ergo they surrendered)
